title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 672-2.1 - Applicability and construction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 672-2.1 - Applicability and construction

State Regulations

This Subpart shall apply to releases of water from

Ashokan reservoir to Esopus Creek, Kensico reservoir to the Bronx River, Rondout reservoir to Rondout Creek, and Schoharie reservoir to Schoharie Creek. Except as otherwise specifically stated herein, this Subpart shall be construed
in a manner consistent with Subpart 672-1 of this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
672-2.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
